BadRequest.Title: Invalid Request
BadRequest.Description: It seems there is an error in the entered data. Please check it and try again.

Unauthorized.Title: Unauthorized
Unauthorized.Description: Your identity could not be verified. Please log in to access this content.

Forbidden.Title: Access Denied
Forbidden.Description: You do not have sufficient permissions to perform this action. Please contact the administrator if you believe this is a mistake.

NotFound.Title: Resource Not Found
NotFound.Description: Sorry, we could not find what you are looking for. Please check the link or the data.

ServerError.Title: Internal Server Error
ServerError.Description: An unexpected issue occurred on the server side. We are working to resolve it; please try again later.

Unknown.Title: An Error Occurred
Unknown.Description: We encountered an unknown issue. Please try again later or contact technical support.

Validation.Invalid: The phone number format must be followed, for example: +971 xx xxx xxxx.
Validation.InvalidIban: The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) is invalid. Please enter a valid IBAN.
Validation.InvalidIdentity: The identity number must be valid, for example: 000-0000-0000000-0
Validation.InvalidName: The entered value does not match the required format.
Validation.EmptyField: This field cannot be empty or contain only spaces
Validation.InformativeMessage: Please enter the Emirates ID number in the approved format: X-XXXX-XXXXXXX-X
Validation.MinNumber: The value must be greater than or equal to {{minNumber}}.
Validation.MaxNumber: The value must be less than or equal to {{maxNumber}}.
Validation.ArabicLettersOnly: Please enter Arabic letters only (no numbers or special characters)
Validation.EnglishLettersOnly: Please enter English letters only (no numbers or special characters)

FileInput.InvalidFileType: The selected file type is not allowed.
FileInput.MaxFileSizeError: File size should not exceed {{maxSize}} MB
FileInput.MaxFileSize: Maximum file size must be {{size}} MB
FileInput.FileNotReadable: The file is not valid for upload.
